name: Tanesha
greetingText: I really like your name but I love to call you as paapa ;) !
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, one more surprise awaits you. Until then enjoy your birthday :)
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
